forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 47F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
